name: Xiaofan Zhang 0002
content: Undefined Lab Room 322-B, Building A Jianchuan Rd, No. 930 Minhang, Shanghai Hi, I am an Associate Professor at Qing Yuan Research Institute, Shanghai Jiao Tong University. Prior to SJTU, I spent two years in SenseBrain located in New Jersey, and one year in JD Group Silicon Valley Research Center. I obtained my B.E. degree in Beihang University and Ph.D. degree of Computer Science from College of Computing and Informatics, UNC Charlotte. My research topics include: pathology image analysis, LLM in medical domain, and multi-modality decision making. I am recruiting students.
